messages.author: kathyw
messages.text:
speechInput -> speech input

(since we're not listing the complete name of the API, just use the English equivalent to talk about it)

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: Add () after method names: start()

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: callback -> your callback (or something similar; callback isn't a required name, so we don't font it)

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: API, otherwise -> API. Otherwise

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: Slight tweaks (if -> whether, add comma, add ()): To check whether recording is currently active, call the isRecording() method.

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text:
on error -> of error
(or "of an error")

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: start -> start()

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: stop -> stop()

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: callback -> the callback function

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: javascript -> JavaScript

messages.author: kathyw
messages.text: We should add examples under docs/examples/<something> and link to them here. But that can wait, unless you have an example handy.

messages.author: Leandro Graciá Gil

messages.text:
The example I have is basically the same simple case I'm already showing here. I guess something more elaborate should go to the examples folder.
